scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a group of four women, each wearing a wimple or veil covering their hair and neck. They are shown in bust or half-length, with their faces turned towards each other. The central figures' hands are clasped together in prayer or supplication. The style is a woodcut, characterized by bold outlines and hatching for shading. No architectural elements or specific setting are visible, suggesting a focus on the figures and their interaction.
